description: Rule definitions for structured code review findings

code-quality.name: Code Quality
code-quality.description: Code follows DRY principles, proper naming, clear logic

type-safety.name: Type Safety
type-safety.description: No 'any' types, proper TypeScript usage, Zod schema inference

component-patterns.name: Component Patterns
component-patterns.description: Components follow established patterns, proper use of hooks

authentication.name: Authentication Security
authentication.description: Auth flows secure, no credential exposure, proper session handling

input-validation.name: Input Validation
input-validation.description: All user input validated at boundaries, no injection risks

secrets-management.name: Secrets Management
secrets-management.description: No hardcoded secrets, proper env var usage, no .env commits

financial-calculations.name: Financial Calculations
financial-calculations.description: All money math uses big.js, never floating-point arithmetic

design-system-compliance.name: Design System Compliance
design-system-compliance.description: Uses defined color tokens, typography, spacing from design system

accessibility.name: Accessibility
accessibility.description: ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, 4.5:1 contrast minimum

responsive-design.name: Responsive Design
responsive-design.description: Mobile-first CSS-first responsive (md: breakpoint, no JS hacks)

test-coverage.name: Test Coverage
test-coverage.description: Tests meet layer thresholds: 100% money.ts, 90% domain, 80% infra
